接口 org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal.PrincipalResolver
的使用

使用 PrincipalResolver 的软件包
org.jasig.cas.authentication Authentication validates the Credentials provided during a /login request. 
org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal Credentials is a marker interface for an opaque object that may be recognized by Handlers and Resolvers. 
 

org.jasig.cas.authentication 中 PrincipalResolver 的使用
 

参数类型为 PrincipalResolver 的 org.jasig.cas.authentication 中的方法
protected  Principal PolicyBasedAuthenticationManager.resolvePrincipal(String handlerName, PrincipalResolver resolver, Credential credential)
           
 

类型变量类型为 PrincipalResolver 的 org.jasig.cas.authentication 中的构造方法参数
PolicyBasedAuthenticationManager(Map<AuthenticationHandler,PrincipalResolver> map)
          Creates a new authentication manager with a map of authentication handlers to the principal resolvers that should be used upon successful authentication if no principal is resolved by the authentication handler.
 

org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal 中 PrincipalResolver 的使用
 

实现 PrincipalResolver 的 org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal 中的类
 class BasicPrincipalResolver
          Provides the most basic means of principal resolution by mapping Credential.getId() onto Principal.getId().
 class ChainingPrincipalResolver
          Delegates to one or more principal resolves in series to resolve a principal.
 class PersonDirectoryPrincipalResolver
          Resolves principals by querying a data source using the Jasig Person Directory API.
 

类型变量类型为 PrincipalResolver 的 org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal 中的方法参数
 void ChainingPrincipalResolver.setChain(List<PrincipalResolver> chain)
          Sets the resolver chain.
